dcterms:description: The 100-hour training set has 28.5k utterances and the average duration per utterance is 12.7 seconds. This dataset contains read speech from audiobooks.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:creator: M. Schuster
K. Nakajima
dcterms:description: The text data for the language model (LM) is derived from the LibriSpeech 100h training transcriptions, consisting of 40 million sentences.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech LM corpus
